text: Can I install python 3.x and 2.x on the same computer?
I'm running windows and the shell/os automatically runs python based on the registry settings when you run a program on the command line.
Will this break if I install a 2.x and 3.x version of python on the same machine?
I want to play with 3.0 while still be able to run 2.x scripts on the same machine...
